name: BookmarkPlayer
description:
This add-on creates a 'BookmarkPlayer' folder in a bookmark.
If you put the corresponding URL or folder in this, you can play it continuously from the toolbar.

Corresponding URL:
https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/smxxxxxxxx
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxxxxxxxxxxx
https://soundcloud.com/Artist name/Song name

Allow autoplay to these sites from the firefox Settings > Privacy and Security > Allow settings.

Setup support&Requests&Bugs, etc.
  SHiii0410223@gmail.com
